adDetails: Hello Craigslist! This ad is for those people who want their houses to look great, for an affordable price. If you are in need of a new floor; TILE,MARMOLE,CARPET,VYNIL,LAMINATE,OR HARDWOOD, you just found the perfect person for your need. I also do flooring repairs so just in case you need any kind of repair done in your house I am also available for that. I can get any kind of flooring that you might need for incomparable prices believe me! I can work around your budget so trust me no one will give you a better price. FREE ESTIMATES it doesn't get better than that! I have 6 years of experience and my customers are very happy with my work. Feel free to give me a call or text at show contact info ask for Edward.
